actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to give priority to conserving the biological integrity and genetic diversity of naturally spawning populations of anadromous fish.
short_title: Anadromous Fish Conservation and Protection Act of 1982

summary.text: Anadromous Fish Conservation and Protection Act of 1982 - Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976, the Salmon and Steelhead Conservation and Enhancement Act of 1980, the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act, the Dingell-Johnson Fish Restoration Act, the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964, the Sikes Act, the Fish and Wildlife Coordination Act, the Pacific Northwest Electric Power Planning and Conservation Act, and other Federal laws to provide for the conservation and protection of naturally spawning anadromous fish populations.

titles.title: Anadromous Fish Conservation and Protection Act of 1982
A bill to give priority to conserving the biological integrity and genetic diversity of naturally spawning populations of anadromous fish.
